H0.text: What was the surname of the French explorer who discovered the area where Montreal is now situated, on this day in 1953. Champlain

H1.text: What was the surname of the French explorer who discovered the area where Montreal is now situated, on this day in 1953. Cartier

H2.text: What was the surname of the French explorer who discovered the area where Montreal is now situated, on this day in 1953. Roberval

H3.text: What was the surname of the French explorer who discovered the area where Montreal is now situated, on this day in 1953. Petite Hermine

A4.text: The French explorer Jacques Cartier visited Hochelaga on October 2, 1535
